New Records: Tyler Herro set a franchise record with his 70th consecutive game with at least one made three-pointer
Key Match Events: Jaime Jaquez Jr. made a pivotal three-pointer in the final minutes
The Heat capitalized on transition opportunities with 17-7 fast-break points
Pre-Game Insights: The Heat showed resilience after a blowout loss to Utah in the first game of Jimmy Butler’s seven-game suspension
Kevin Love missed the game for personal reasons but his leadership has galvanized the team during Butler’s absence
Post-Match Reflections: The Jazz struggled with 17 turnovers and key player injuries, extending their home losing streak to nine games
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Heat (19-17) continue their road trip with a game against the Portland Trail Blazers on Saturday
The Jazz (9-27) will face the Phoenix Suns in an afternoon matchup the same day
